title: Made in America Week, 2025
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation declaring July 20 through July 26, 2025, as Made in America Week. It emphasizes the importance of American manufacturing, innovation, and putting American workers and industries first. The proclamation highlights efforts to modernize trade agreements, attract foreign and domestic investments, and boost domestic production through policies like the One Big Beautiful Bill. It also mentions actions to enforce the "Made in the U.S.A." label and crack down on false claims. The proclamation calls on all Americans to honor those who contribute to making America great through their work and craftsmanship.
